title: The Jamie McGuire Collection: Beautiful Disaster, Walking Disaster, and A Beautiful Wedding
description: Meet your new obsession—Travis Maddox—in this special collection from the international phenomenon and #1 New York Times bestselling author Jamie McGuire.BEAUTIFUL DISASTERAbby Abernathy is a good girl with a dark past she thinks she’s finally escaped—until she meets Travis Maddox, the ultimate bad boy.WALKING DISASTERBeautiful Disaster told Abby Abernathy’s side of the story; now it’s Travis Maddox’s turn. Travis’s life is full of fast women, underground gambling, and violence. But just when he thinks he’s invincible, Abby brings him to his knees.A BEAUTIFUL WEDDINGEveryone knows that Abby Abernathy suddenly became Mrs. Maddox—but what really happened when she and Travis eloped to Vegas? Find out in this special novella that takes you inside the wedding day…and night.
author: Jamie McGuire
